attributes.action: Give a vote of no confidence in this government particularly Home Secretary to tackle violent crime in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the best this Home Secretary and this Government can do to tackle Gn crime and violent crime is to offer a amnesty so thugs can hand guns in, then both HS and this government should resign, I am as  UK citzen saddened that EVERY DAY we read of someone being murdered or violently attacked, There is no deterrent in the Britsh justice system anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
